content: This is THE app I've been searching for. I quickly grew tired of the limitations of the standard Philips Hue App. I have 12 Hue Color + White bulbs on my party patio. I wanted an app that simply sequence the lights as one group. I've spent MOST of my time within this app in the mood settings. The disco portion is super neat but most of the time, it's just me chilling out on the patio in the evening hours. If I'm hosting a party, the disco tab is the perfect place to control my lights. As of 03-15-2019, Philips released their Hue Discover Outdoor Color + White lights. They are nice and bright, at 2300 lumens. I purchased 3 of them so now my Hue Disco App controls all 15 of my outdoor patio lights. However, I've run into an issue. Hue Disco controls all of my 15 lights perfect from my phone. The issue is this: When I run the  mood routine within the Hue Disco App, it plays beautifully until my phones' screen darks out. Once my screen darks out on my phone, the Hue Disco App immediately stops and freezes in mid-cycle, leaving me with a single color on my bulbs. As soon as I "wake" my phone, the Hue Disco App starts back up again. Any suggestions?

Overall the best hue lighting app I've used! Some suggestions though: Set certain lighting theme upon open instead of just "disco mode." 2) Default theme settings. For example, I never use the "always" setting. I set it to never because I like having all my lights be a different color. 3) lighting groups. During the day I select the light behind my TV and the hallway light to active and all my other lights are just white. At night I set all to color. I would make myself a day and night group.
